tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE whistleblower_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  report_description TEXT,
  investigation_status VARCHAR(20),
  investigator_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_investigations (
    investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID REFERENCES whistleblower_reports(report_id),
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    investigation_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    investigation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_actions (
    action_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investigation_id UUID REFERENCES whistleblower_investigations(investigation_id),
    action_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    action_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS whistleblower_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS investigations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS whistleblower_contacts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  contact_name VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE whistleblower_investigations (
    investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID REFERENCES whistleblower_reports(report_id),
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE investigators (
    investigator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    department_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    regulation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)
